WorkItem.Description: Please take a look at this file.  Some problems I managed to solve by using macros to format the numbers.  However, there are still weird problems where the table width is set oddly, and text wrapping.  I'm uploading the original (with none of my macros) with some dummy numbers and text in it.  Please take a look.

Comments.Message:
Thousands scale (1000^n) support in PHPExcel_Style_NumberFormat::toFormattedString
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=12096

Can you check if it got better with latest source code tomorrow:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets
